system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
Effect: The user may freely move up to the Movement Score of their choice when declaring this attack. After resolving this attack, the user may freely move themselves to any of the targeted squares or within 10m vertically above them.
Requirement: [Decidueye] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Spirit Shackle on the user's Active List.
